title: SMC_ReadNCQueue (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_ReadNCQueue
This FB is used for files created with Codesys V2.3;
To write the queue to a file or to read the queue from a file:
the FBs SMC_WriteQueueToFile and SMC_ReadQueueFromFile from
SM3_Debug library can be used.
This function block will read an
SMC_OUTQUEUE
file,
which has been created by the CNC editor,
from the PLC file system and provide an OutQueue structure,
which typically is processed by the decoder.

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment:
Rising edge: Starts execution. WhileTRUE, the function
block stays active

rows:
Pointer on a sufficiently large, free data area (buffer)
that is allocated in the IEC application.
Size of the buffer in byte
TRUE, while execution of function block is not finished

Signals, that an error has occurred within the function
block
Pointer on queue that has been read in.

Number ofSMC_GEOINFOobjects, which have been read
and written to the queue up to now.
